statements: SELECT * FROM player_interactions;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_description, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description FROM player_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_description FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%attack%' AND interaction_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 23:59:59';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(player_id) AS total_interactions FROM player_interactions GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT player_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id IN (456, 789) AND interaction_type = 'quest' ORDER BY player_id, interaction_timestamp;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM player_interactions WHERE DATE(interaction_timestamp) = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 3 ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT message_text, sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 4;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, sent_at FROM chat_messages WHERE message_id = 10;
SELECT interaction_type, details FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, sent_at FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1
SELECT message_text, sender_id, receiver_id, message_id, sent_at FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY sent_at DESC
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4
SELECT * FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'chat' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp LIMIT 5
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, sent_at FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY sent_at ASC
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM collaborations WHERE start_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT player1_id, player2_id, collaboration_type FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type = 'project';
SELECT * FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT collaboration_id, collaboration_type, start_date FROM collaborations WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT player1_id, player2_id, winner_id FROM battles WHERE winner_id IS NOT NULL AND battle_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY battle_date ASC;
SELECT message_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_collaborations FROM collaborations GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players WHERE player_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM chat_messages;
SELECT message_id, player_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT player1_id, player2_id, battle_outcome FROM battles ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT player_id, total_wins, total_losses FROM player_statistics WHERE total_wins > total_losses;
SELECT inventory_id, player_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM chat_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message_text, player_id, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT player_id, message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE message_text LIKE '%hello%';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM chat_messages GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_messages DESC LIMIT 5;
